name: CWinException

screenshots.caption: Demonstration of exception handling with CWinException (C++)

short_description: CWinException is a powerful C++ Class designed to track Win32/COM/MFC Errors. Correct and convenient handling of errors usually becomes a headache if you don't use a good technique. Write robust, readable and elegant code with this class.
